title: duplicate emails
content:
I see that others have had the same problem as me. My trash folder has many thousands of duplicate emails. If I block delete them it will take days to complete. So 3 questions 1. How do I stop duplicate emails in my trash. After deleting many reappear with the date 01/01/1970 2. Is there a faster way of deleting. I use select email>shift key>find last email>delete 3. Is there a limit to how many emails I can put into the block mentioned in #2

Image attached at

link text
creator: keithinoz1

title: email not downloading from server onto my iMac.
content:
my email stopped downloading on my iMac (2010 model) after November 15th 2023. I was told it was because it was so old, the security protocols were out of date. I bought the latest iMac (M3 chip) but I still can't download my email. I can send an email from the Mac, and I receive emails on my iPhone, just not my computer. I have the latest version of Thunderbird. 115.7.0 (64 bit). I have deleted some emails, and those will re-download (which is weird) but nothing new. It will show on the bottom left "downloading 1 of 538", but never downloads.

Please help!

Jack.
creator: jaclby

title: Wanting a reinstall a gmail account I have deleted from Thunderbird Getting Yellow Unable to log in at Server
content: Hi, I "deleted" one of my gmail accounts from Thunderbird, hoping to then be able to reinstall it as a new account. I "deleted" it (using the deletion process via "Account Actions" because it was not connecting to server. When I attempt to reinstall a the now "deleted" account I get the yellow "Unable to log in at Server" message. How can I get out of this situation please. The password I am using to add the account is the same as the one I use to sign into that account on gmail, but it does not seem to be working on TB I am using TB 115.7.0 Any suggestion please JB
creator: barbnjohn

title: Thunderbird 115: Hotmail smtp server does not accept password - oaut authentication methodd is missing
content: The latest version of thunderbird (115.7.0) does not send mail from the connected hotmail account. The same account can receive mail. Among the grants, I found a description that is also related to this. Someone also experienced the same thing in version 115. I read there in the answer that oaut authentication must be set in the smtp settings. I don't have such an option in the drop-down combo of authentication. What to do?
creator: arpadhazy
